initialBriefing.title: Initial Briefing
initialBriefing.heading: Structure your business consulting session
initialBriefing.paragraph: Briefly describe your company's context, consulting objective, and time horizon. The AI will structure an analysis focusing on prioritization, risks, and opportunities.
initialBriefing.example1: e.g., "I am the CEO of an early-stage B2B SaaS in Brazil"
initialBriefing.example2: e.g., "I want to increase recurring revenue within 12 months"
initialBriefing.example3: e.g., "I want to evaluate expansion into new segments or countries"

tone.label: Consultant's Frankness Level
tone.description: Adjust the frankness and depth of the AI consultant.
tone.level1_desc: Kinder, more motivational responses, focused on building confidence and providing positive guidance.
tone.level2_desc: Responses that challenge assumptions with questions, encouraging deep reflection and autonomous discovery.
tone.level3_desc: Direct, no-nonsense, data-driven answers focused on efficiency and the unvarnished truth.
